bill.summary:
Donate for Disaster Relief Act of 2019
This bill allows individual taxpayers to designate an amount (not less than $1) of any overpayment of income tax for a Disaster Relief Fund established by this bill to provide relief for major disasters declared under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act.
